h4.p: [03]^b^3^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha ^a^V0.0002^ea^^b^citta.m^eb^ taava catubbidha.m hoti kaamaavacara.m ruupaavacara.m aruupaavacara.m lokuttara~nceti.

[03]^b^4^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha katama.m ^b^kaamaavacara.m^eb^? Somanassasahagata.m di.t.thigatasampayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikameka.m, somanassasahagata.m di.t.thigatavippayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikameka.m ^a^M0.0002^ea^, upekkhaasahagata.m di.t.thigatasampayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikameka.m, upekkhaasahagata.m di.t.thigatavippayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikamekanti imaani a.t.thapi lobhasahagatacittaani naama.
[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^ Domanassasahagata.m pa.tighasampayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikamekanti imaani dvepi pa.tighasampayuttacittaani naama.
[03]^b^6^eb^^b^.^eb^ Upekkhaasahagata.m vicikicchaasampayuttameka.m, upekkhaasahagata.m uddhaccasampayuttamekanti imaani dvepi momuuhacittaani naama.

[03]^b^9^eb^^b^.^eb^ Upekkhaasahagata.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, tathaa sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m ^a^V0.0003^ea^, dukkhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, upekkhaasahagata.m sampa.ticchanacitta.m, upekkhaasahagata.m santiira.nacitta~nceti imaani sattapi akusalavipaakacittaani naama.

[03]^b^10^eb^^b^.^eb^ Upekkhaasahagata.m kusalavipaaka.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, tathaa sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, sukhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, upekkhaasahagata.m sampa.ticchanacitta.m, somanassasahagata.m santiira.nacitta.m, upekkhaasahagata.m santiira.nacitta~nceti imaani a.t.thapi kusalavipaakaahetukacittaani naama.

[03]^b^11^eb^^b^.^eb^ Upekkhaasahagata.m ^a^M0.0003^ea^ pa~ncadvaaraavajjanacitta.m, tathaa manodvaaraavajjanacitta.m, somanassasahagata.m hasituppaadacitta~nceti imaani tii.nipi ahetukakiriyacittaani naama.

[03]^b^15^eb^^b^.^eb^ Somanassasahagata.m ~naa.nasampayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikameka.m, somanassasahagata.m ~naa.navippayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikameka.m, upekkhaasahagata.m ~naa.nasampayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikameka.m. Upekkhaasahagata.m ~naa.navippayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikamekanti imaani a.t.thapi kaamaavacarakusalacittaani naama.

[03]^b^16^eb^^b^.^eb^ Somanassasahagata.m ~naa.nasampayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikameka.m, somanassasahagata.m ^a^V0.0004^ea^ ~naa.navippayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikameka.m, upekkhaasahagata.m ~naa.nasampayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikameka.m, upekkhaasahagata.m ~naa.navippayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikamekanti imaani a.t.thapi sahetukakaamaavacaravipaakacittaani naama.

[03]^b^17^eb^^b^.^eb^ Somassasahagata.m ~naa.nasampayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikameka.m, somanassasahagata.m ~naa.navippayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m ^a^M0.0004^ea^, sasa"nkhaarikameka.m, upekkhaasahagata.m ~naa.nasampayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikameka.m, upekkhaasahagata.m ~naa.navippayutta.m asa"nkhaarikameka.m, sasa"nkhaarikamekanti imaani a.t.thapi sahetukakaamaavacarakiriyacittaani naama.

[03]^b^21^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vitakkavicaarapiitisukhekaggataasahita.m pa.thamajjhaanakusalacitta.m, vicaarapiitisukhekaggataasahita.m dutiyajjhaanakusalacitta.m, piitisukhekaggataasahita.m tatiyajjhaanakusalacitta.m, sukhekaggataasahita.m catutthajjhaanakusalacitta.m, upekkhekaggataasahita.m pa~ncamajjhaanakusalacitta~nceti imaani pa~ncapi ruupaavacarakusalacittaani naama.

[03]^b^22^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vitakkavicaarapiitisukhekaggataasahita.m pa.thamajjhaanavipaakacitta.m, vicaarapiitisukhekaggataasahita.m dutiyajjhaanavipaakacitta.m, piitisukhekaggataasahita.m tatiyajjhaanavipaakacitta.m, sukhekaggataasahita.m ^a^V0.0005^ea^ catutthajjhaanavipaakacitta.m, upekkhekaggataasahita.m pa~ncamajjhaanavipaakacitta~nceti imaani pa~ncapi ruupaavacaravipaakacittaani naama.

[03]^b^23^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vitakkavicaarapiitisukhekaggataasahita.m pa.thamajjhaanakiriyacitta.m, vicaarapiitisukhekaggataasahita.m dutiyajjhaanakiriyacitta.m, piitisukhekaggataasahita.m tatiyajjhaanakiriyacitta.m ^a^M0.0005^ea^, sukhekaggataasahita.m catutthajjhaanakiriyacitta.m, upekkhekaggataasahita.m pa~ncamajjhaanakiriyacitta~nceti imaani pa~ncapi ruupaavacarakiriyacittaani naama.

[03]^b^26^eb^^b^.^eb^ AAkaasaana~ncaayatanakusalacitta.m, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanakusalacitta.m, aaki~nca~n~naayatanakusalacitta.m, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakusalacitta~nceti imaani cattaaripi aruupaavacarakusalacittaani naama.

[03]^b^27^eb^^b^.^eb^ AAkaasaana~ncaayatanavipaakacitta.m, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanavipaakacitta.m, aaki~nca~n~naayatanavipaakacitta.m, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanavipaakacitta~nceti imaani cattaaripi aruupaavacaravipaakacittaani naama.

[03]^b^28^eb^^b^.^eb^ AAkaasaana~ncaayatanakiriyacitta.m, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanakiriyacitta.m, aaki~nca~n~naayatanakiriyacitta.m, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakiriyacitta~nceti imaani cattaaripi aruupaavacarakiriyacittaani naama.
[03]^b^31^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sotaapattimaggacitta.m ^a^M0.0006^ea^, sakadaagaamimaggacitta.m, anaagaamimaggacitta.m, arahattamaggacitta~nceti imaani cattaaripi lokuttarakusalacittaani naama.
[03]^b^32^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sotaapattiphalacitta.m, sakadaagaamiphalacitta.m, anaagaamiphalacitta.m, arahattaphalacitta~nceti imaani cattaaripi lokuttaravipaakacittaani naama.

[03]^b^38^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kathamekuunanavutividha.m ^a^V0.0007^ea^ citta.m ekaviisasata.m hoti? Vitakkavicaarapiitisukhekaggataasahita.m pa.thamajjhaanasotaapattimaggacitta.m, vicaarapiitisukhekaggataasahita.m dutiyajjhaanasotaapattimaggacitta.m, piitisukhekaggataasahita.m tatiyajjhaanasotaapattimaggacitta.m, sukhekaggataasahita.m catutthajjhaanasotaapattimaggacitta.m, upekkhekaggataasahita.m pa~ncamajjhaanasotaapattimaggacitta~nceti imaani pa~ncapi sotaapattimaggacittaani naama.
[03]^b^2^eb^^b^.^eb^ Katha.m? Phasso vedanaa sa~n~naa cetanaa ekaggataa jiivitindriya.m manasikaaro ceti sattime cetasikaa ^b^sabbacittasaadhaara.naa^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^3^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vitakko ^a^M0.0008^ea^ vicaaro adhimokkho viiriya.m piiti chando caati cha ime cetasikaa ^b^paki.n.nakaa^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^ Moho ahirika.m anottappa.m uddhacca.m lobho di.t.thi maano doso issaa macchariya.m kukkucca.m thina.m middha.m vicikicchaa ceti cuddasime cetasikaa ^b^akusalaa^eb^ naama.

[03]^b^6^eb^^b^.^eb^ Saddhaa sati hirii ottappa.m alobho adoso tatramajjhattataa kaayapassaddhi cittapassaddhi kaayalahutaa cittalahutaa kaayamudutaa cittamudutaa kaayakamma~n~nataa cittakamma~n~nataa kaayapaagu~n~nataa ^a^V0.0009^ea^ cittapaagu~n~nataa kaayujukataa cittujukataa ceti ekuunaviisatime cetasikaa ^b^sobhanasaadhaara.naa^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^7^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo ceti tisso ^b^viratiyo^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^8^eb^^b^.^eb^ Karu.naa muditaa ^b^appama~n~naayo^eb^ naamaati sabbathaapi pa~n~nindriyena saddhi.m pa~ncaviisatime cetasikaa ^b^sobhanaa^eb^ti veditabbaa.
[03]^b^12^eb^^b^.^eb^ Katha.m? ^b^Sabbacittasaadhaara.naa^eb^ taava sattime cetasikaa sabbesupi ekuunanavuticittuppaadesu labbhanti.
[03]^b^13^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paki.n.nakesu^eb^ pana vitakko taava dvipa~ncavi~n~naa.navajjitakaamaavacaracittesu ceva ekaadasasu pa.thamajjhaanacittesu ceti pa~ncapa~n~naasacittesu uppajjati.
[03]^b^14^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vicaaro ^a^V0.0010^ea^ pana tesu ceva ekaadasasu dutiyajjhaanacittesu caati chasa.t.thicittesu.
[03]^b^20^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Akusalesu^eb^ pana moho ahirika.m anottappa.m uddhacca~ncaati cattaarome cetasikaa sabbaakusalasaadhaara.naa naama, sabbesupi dvaadasaa kusalesu labbhanti.
[03]^b^24^eb^^b^.^eb^ Doso ^a^V0.0011^ea^ issaa macchariya.m kukkucca~ncaati dviisu pa.tighasampayuttacittesu.
[03]^b^28^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sobhanesu^eb^ pana sobhanasaadhaara.naa taava ekuunaviisatime cetasikaa sabbesupi ekuunasa.t.thisobhanacittesu sa.mvijjanti.
[03]^b^29^eb^^b^.^eb^ Viratiyo ^a^M0.0011^ea^ pana tissopi lokuttaracittesu sabbathaapi niyataa ekatova labbhanti, lokiyesu pana kaamaavacarakusalesveva kadaaci sandissanti visu.m visu.m.

[03]^b^30^eb^^b^.^eb^ Appama~n~naayo pana dvaadasasu pa~ncamajjhaanavajjitamahaggatacittesu ceva kaamaavacarakusalesu ca sahetukakaamaavacarakiriyacittesu caati a.t.thaviisaticittesveva kadaaci naanaa hutvaa jaayanti, upekkhaasahagatesu panettha karu.naamuditaa na santiiti keci vadanti.
[03]^b^31^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pa~n~naa pana dvaadasasu ~naa.nasampayuttakaamaavacaracittesu ceva sabbesupi pa~ncati.msamahaggatalokuttaracittesu caati sattacattaaliisacittesu sampayoga.m gacchatiiti.
[22]Naanaa kadaaci maano ca, thina middha.m tathaa saha.

[03]^b^36^eb^^b^.^eb^ Katha.m ^a^M0.0012^ea^? ^b^Lokuttaresu^eb^ taava a.t.thasu pa.thamajjhaanikacittesu a~n~nasamaanaa terasa cetasikaa, appama~n~naavajjitaa teviisati sobhanacetasikaa ceti chatti.msa dhammaa sa"ngaha.m gacchanti, tathaa dutiyajjhaanikacittesu vitakkavajjaa, tatiyajjhaanikacittesu vitakkavicaaravajjaa, catutthajjhaanikacittesu vitakkavicaarapiitivajjaa, pa~ncamajjhaanikacittesupi upekkhaasahagataa te eva sa"ngayhantiiti sabbathaapi a.t.thasu lokuttaracittesu pa~ncakajjhaanavasena pa~ncadhaava sa"ngaho hotiiti.

[03]^b^38^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahaggatesu^eb^ pana tiisu pa.thamajjhaanikacittesu taava a~n~nasamaanaa terasa cetasikaa, viratittayavajjitaa dvaaviisati sobhanacetasikaa ceti pa~ncati.msa dhammaa sa"ngaha.m gacchanti, karu.naamuditaa panettha paccekameva yojetabbaa, tathaa dutiyajjhaanikacittesu vitakkavajjaa, tatiyajjhaanikacittesu vitakkavicaaravajjaa, catutthajjhaanikacittesu vitakkavicaarapiitivajjaa, pa~ncamajjhaanikacittesu pana pannarasasu appama~n~naayo na labbhantiiti sabbathaapi sattaviisatimahaggatacittesu pa~ncakajjhaanavasena pa~ncadhaava sa"ngaho hotiiti.

[03]^b^40^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kaamaavacarasobhanesu^eb^ pana kusalesu taava pa.thamadvaye a~n~nasamaanaa terasa cetasikaa, pa~ncaviisati sobhanacetasikaa ^a^M0.0013^ea^ ceti a.t.thati.msa dhammaa sa"ngaha.m gacchanti, appama~n~naaviratiyo panettha pa~ncapi paccekameva yojetabbaa, tathaa dutiyadvaye ~naa.navajjitaa, tatiyadvaye ~naa.nasampayuttaa piitivajjitaa, catutthadvaye ~naa.napiitivajjitaa te eva sa"ngayhanti. Kiriyacittesupi virativajjitaa tatheva catuusupi dukesu catudhaava sa"ngayhanti. Tathaa vipaakesu ca appama~n~naavirativajjitaa te eva sa"ngayhantiiti sabbathaapi catuviisatikaamaavacarasobhanacittesu dukavasena dvaadasadhaava sa"ngaho hotiiti.

[03]^b^43^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Akusalesu^eb^ pana lobhamuulesu taava pa.thame asa"nkhaarike a~n~nasamaanaa terasa cetasikaa, akusalasaadhaara.naa cattaaro caati sattarasa lobhadi.t.thiihi saddhi.m ekuunaviisati dhammaa sa"ngaha.m gacchanti.
[03]^b^45^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye tatheva piitivajjitaa lobhadi.t.thiihi saha a.t.thaarasa.

[03]^b^47^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pa~ncame pana pa.tighasampayutte asa"nkhaarike doso issaa macchariya.m kukkucca~ncaati catuuhi saddhi.m piitivajjitaa te eva viisati dhammaa sa"ngayhanti, issaamacchariyakukkuccaani panettha paccekameva yojetabbaani.
[03]^b^49^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chandapiitivajjitaa pana a~n~nasamaanaa ekaadasa, akusalasaadhaara.naa cattaaro caati pannarasa dhammaa uddhaccasahagate sampayujjanti.

[03]^b^50^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vicikicchaasahagatacitte ca adhimokkhavirahitaa vicikicchaasahagataa tatheva pannarasa ^a^V0.0015^ea^ dhammaa samupalabbhantiiti sabbathaapi dvaadasaakusalacittuppaadesu pacceka.m yojiyamaanaapi ga.nanavasena sattadhaava sa"ngahitaa bhavantiiti.
[03]^b^52^eb^^b^.^eb^ Saadhaara.naa ca cattaaro, samaanaa ca dasaapare.
[03]^b^53^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ahetukesu^eb^ pana hasanacitte taava chandavajjitaa a~n~nasamaanaa dvaadasa dhammaa sa"ngaha.m gacchanti.
[03]^b^57^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dvipa~ncavi~n~naa.ne ^a^M0.0015^ea^ paki.n.nakavajjitaa teyeva sa"ngayhantiiti sabbathaapi a.t.thaarasasu ahetukesu ga.nanavasena catudhaava sa"ngaho hotiiti.
[03]^b^3^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha ^b^vedanaasa"ngahe^eb^ taava tividhaa vedanaa sukha.m dukkha.m adukkhamasukhaa ceti, sukha.m dukkha.m somanassa.m domanassa.m upekkhaati ca bhedena pana pa~ncadhaa hoti.
[03]^b^4^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha sukhasahagata.m kusalavipaaka.m kaayavi~n~naa.namekameva, tathaa dukkhasahagata.m akusalavipaaka.m.

[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^ Somanassasahagatacittaani ^a^M0.0016^ea^ pana lobhamuulaani cattaari, dvaadasa kaamaavacarasobhanaani, sukhasantiira.nahasanaani ca dveti a.t.thaarasa kaamaavacarasomanassasahagatacittaani ceva pa.thamadutiyatatiyacatutthajjhaanasa"nkhaataani ^a^V0.0017^ea^ catucattaaliisa mahaggatalokuttaracittaani ceti dvaasa.t.thividhaani bhavanti.
[03]^b^10^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Hetusa"ngahe^eb^ hetuu naama lobho doso moho alobho adoso amoho caati chabbidhaa bhavanti.
[03]^b^14^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sesaani dasa akusalacittaani ceva ~naa.navippayuttaani dvaadasa kaamaavacarasobhanaani ceti dvaaviisati dvihetukacittaani.
[03]^b^15^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dvaadasa ^a^M0.0017^ea^^a^V0.0018^ea^ ~naa.nasampayuttakaamaavacarasobhanaani ceva pa~ncati.msa mahaggatalokuttaracittaani ceti sattacattaaliisa tihetukacittaaniiti.
[03]^b^20^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha dve upekkhaasahagatasantiira.naani ceva a.t.tha mahaavipaakaani ca nava ruupaaruupavipaakaani ceti ekuunaviisati cittaani pa.tisandhibhava"ngacutikiccaani naama.
[03]^b^26^eb^^b^.^eb^ A.t.tha ^a^M0.0018^ea^ mahaavipaakaani ceva santiira.nattaya~nceti ekaadasa tadaaramma.nakiccaani.
[03]^b^27^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tesu pana dve upekkhaasahagatasantiira.nacittaani pa.tisandhibhava"ngacutitadaaramma.nasantiira.navasena pa~ncakiccaani naama.
[03]^b^34^eb^^b^.^eb^ A.t.thasa.t.thi tathaa dve ca, navaa.t.tha dve yathaakkama.m.
[03]^b^35^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dvaarasa"ngahe^eb^^a^V0.0020^ea^ dvaaraani naama cakkhudvaara.m sotadvaara.m ghaanadvaara.m jivhaadvaara.m kaayadvaara.m manodvaara~nceti chabbidhaani bhavanti.

[03]^b^39^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha pa~ncadvaaraavajjanacakkhuvi~n~naa.nasampa.ticchanasantiira.navo.t.thabbanakaamaavacarajavanatadaaramma.navasena chacattaaliisa cittaani cakkhudvaare yathaaraha.m uppajjanti, tathaa pa~ncadvaaraavajjanasotavi~n~naa.naadivasena sotadvaaraadiisupi chacattaaliiseva bhavantiiti sabbathaapi pa~ncadvaare catupa~n~naasa cittaani kaamaavacaraaneva.
[03]^b^42^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tesu pana pa~ncavi~n~naa.naani ceva mahaggatalokuttarajavanaani ceti chatti.msa yathaarahamekadvaarikacittaani naama.

[03]^b^48^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^AAlamba.nasa"ngahe^eb^^a^M0.0020^ea^ aaramma.naani naama ruupaaramma.na.m saddaaramma.na.m gandhaaramma.na.m rasaaramma.na.m pho.t.thabbaaramma.na.m dhammaaramma.na~nceti chabbidhaani bhavanti.
[03]^b^49^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha ruupameva ruupaaramma.na.m, tathaa saddaadayo saddaaramma.naadiini.
[03]^b^51^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha cakkhudvaarikacittaana.m sabbesampi ruupameva aaramma.na.m, ta~nca paccuppanna.m. Tathaa sotadvaarikacittaadiinampi saddaadiini, taani ca paccuppannaaniyeva.
[03]^b^52^eb^^b^.^eb^ Manodvaarikacittaana.m pana chabbidhampi paccuppannamatiita.m anaagata.m kaalavimutta~nca yathaarahamaaramma.na.m hoti.

[03]^b^53^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dvaaravimuttaana~nca pa.tisandhibhava"ngacutisa"nkhaataana.m chabbidhampi yathaasambhava.m yebhuyyena bhavantare ^a^V0.0022^ea^ chadvaaraggahita.m paccuppannamatiita.m pa~n~nattibhuuta.m vaa kammakammanimittagatinimittasammata.m aaramma.na.m hoti.
[03]^b^64^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vatthusa"ngahe^eb^ vatthuuni naama cakkhusotaghaanajivhaakaayahadayavatthu ceti chabbidhaani bhavanti.
[03]^b^68^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha pa~ncavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyo yathaakkama.m ekantena pa~nca pasaadavatthuuni nissaayeva pavattanti.
[03]^b^69^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pa~ncadvaaraavajjanasampa.ticchanasa"nkhaataa pana manodhaatu ca hadaya.m nissitaayeva pavattanti.
[03]^b^70^eb^^b^.^eb^ Avasesaa ^a^M0.0022^ea^ pana manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusa"nkhaataa ca santiira.namahaavipaakapa.tighadvayapa.thamamaggahasanaruupaavacaravasena hadaya.m nissaayeva pavattanti.
[03]^b^71^eb^^b^.^eb^ Avasesaa kusalaakusalakiriyaanuttaravasena pana nissaaya vaa anissaaya vaa.
[03]^b^73^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chavatthu.m ^a^V0.0024^ea^ nissitaa kaame, satta ruupe catubbidhaa.
[03]^b^2^eb^.^b^.^eb^ Vīthimuttānaṃ pana kammakammanimittagatinimittavasena tividhā hoti visayappavatti.
[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ ^a^M0.0023^ea^^a^V0.0025^ea^ sotaviññāṇaṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇañceti cha viññāṇāni.

[03]^b^6^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cha vīthiyo^eb^ pana cakkhudvāravīthi sotadvāravīthi ghānadvāravīthi jivhādvāravīthi kāyadvāravīthi manodvāravīthi ceti dvāravasena vā, cakkhuviññāṇavīthi sotaviññāṇavīthi ghānaviññāṇavīthi jivhāviññāṇavīthi kāyaviññāṇavīthi manoviññāṇavīthi ceti viññāṇavasena vā dvārappavattā cittappavattiyo yojetabbā.
[03]^b^7^eb^^b^.^eb^ Atimahantaṃ mahantaṃ parittaṃ atiparittañceti pañcadvāre manodvāre pana vibhūtamavibhūtañceti chadhā visayappavatti veditabbā.

[03]^b^10^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ekacittakkhaṇātītāni vā bahucittakkhaṇātītāni vā ṭhitippattāneva pañcārammaṇāni pañcadvāre āpāthamāgacchanti. Tasmā yadi ekacittakkhaṇātītakaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthamāgacchati, tato dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅge calite bhavaṅgasotaṃ vocchinditvā tameva rūpārammaṇaṃ āvajjantaṃ pañcadvārāvajjanacittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati, tato tassānantaraṃ tameva ^a^M0.0024^ea^ rūpaṃ passantaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, sampaṭicchantaṃ sampaṭicchanacittaṃ, santīrayamānaṃ santīraṇacittaṃ, vavatthapentaṃ voṭṭhabbanacittañceti yathākkamaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhanti, tato paraṃ ekūnatiṃsa ^a^V0.0026^ea^ kāmāvacarajavanesu yaṃkiñci laddhapaccayaṃ yebhuyyena sattakkhattuṃ javati, javanānubandhāni ca dve tadārammaṇapākāni yathārahaṃ pavattanti, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapāto.

[03]^b^11^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ettāvatā cuddasa vīthicittuppādā, dve bhavaṅgacalanāni, pubbevātītakamekacittakkhaṇanti katvā sattarasa cittakkhaṇāni paripūrenti, tato paraṃ nirujjhati, ārammaṇametaṃ ^b^atimahantaṃ^eb^ nāma gocaraṃ.
[03]^b^12^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yāva tadārammaṇuppādā pana appahontātītakamāpāthamāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ ^b^mahantaṃ^eb^ nāma, tattha javanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hoti, natthi tadārammaṇuppādo.

[03]^b^13^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yāva javanuppādāpi appahontātītakamāpāthamāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ ^b^parittaṃ^eb^ nāma, tattha javanampi anuppajjitvā dvattikkhattuṃ voṭṭhabbanameva pavattati, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapātova hoti.
[03]^b^14^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yāva voṭṭhabbanuppādā ca pana appahontātītakamāpāthamāgataṃ nirodhāsannamārammaṇaṃ ^b^atiparittaṃ^eb^ nāma, tattha bhavaṅgacalanameva hoti, natthi vīthicittuppādo.

[03]^b^15^eb^^b^.^eb^ Iccevaṃ cakkhudvāre, tathā sotadvārādīsu ceti sabbathāpi pañcadvāre tadārammaṇajavanavoṭṭhabbanamoghavārasaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ vārānaṃ yathākkamaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā visayappavatti catudhā veditabbā.

[03]^b^17^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Manodvāre^eb^^a^M0.0025^ea^^a^V0.0027^ea^ pana yadi ^b^vibhūta^eb^mārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgacalanamanodvārāvajjanajavanāvasāne tadārammaṇapākāni pavattanti, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapāto.
[03]^b^18^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Avibhūte^eb^ panārammaṇe javanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hoti, natthi tadārammaṇuppādoti.
[03]^b^20^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Appanājavanavāre^eb^ pana vibhūtāvibhūtabhedo natthi, tathā tadārammaṇuppādo ca.

[03]^b^21^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha hi ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacarajavanānamaṭṭhannaṃ aññatarasmiṃ parikammopacārānulomagotrabhunāmena catukkhattuṃ tikkhattumeva vā yathākkamaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhānantarameva yathārahaṃ catutthaṃ, pañcamaṃ vā chabbīsatimahaggatalokuttarajavanesu yathābhinīhāravasena yaṃ kiñci javanaṃ appanāvīthimotarati, tato paraṃ appanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hoti.

[03]^b^22^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha somanassasahagatajavanānantaraṃ appanāpi somanassasahagatāva pāṭikaṅkhitabbā, upekkhāsahagatajavanānantaraṃ upekkhāsahagatāva, tatthāpi kusalajavanānantaraṃ kusalajavanañceva heṭṭhimañca phalattayamappeti, kiriyajavanānantaraṃ kiriyajavanaṃ arahattaphalañcāti.

[03]^b^27^eb^^b^.^eb^ Atiiṭṭhe pana somanassasahagatāneva santīraṇatadārammaṇāni, tatthāpi somanassasahagatakiriyajavanāvasāne somanassasahagatāneva tadārammaṇāni bhavanti, upekkhāsahagatakiriyajavanāvasāne ca upekkhāsahagatāneva honti.

[03]^b^28^eb^^b^.^eb^ Domanassasahagatajavanāvasāne ca pana tadārammaṇāniceva bhavaṅgāni ca upekkhāsahagatāneva bhavanti, tasmā yadi somanassapaṭisandhikassa domanassasahagatajavanāvasāne tadārammaṇasambhavo natthi, tadā yaṃ kiñci paricitapubbaṃ parittārammaṇamārabbha upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ uppajjati, tamanantaritvā bhavaṅgapātova hotīti vadanti ācariyā.
[03]^b^29^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tathā kāmāvacarajavanāvasāne kāmāvacarasattānaṃ kāmāvacaradhammesveva ārammaṇabhūtesu tadārammaṇaṃ icchantīti.
[03]^b^31^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Javanesu^eb^^a^M0.0027^ea^^a^V0.0029^ea^ ca parittajavanavīthiyaṃ kāmāvacarajavanāni sattakkhattuṃ chakkhattumeva vā javanti.
[03]^b^33^eb^^b^.^eb^ Bhagavato pana yamakapāṭihāriyakālādīsu lahukappavattiyaṃ cattāripañca vā paccavekkhaṇacittāni bhavantītipi vadanti.
[03]^b^34^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ādikammikassa pana paṭhamakappanāyaṃ mahaggatajavanāniabhiññājavanāni ca sabbadāpi ekavārameva javanti, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapāto.
[03]^b^35^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cattāro pana magguppādā ekacittakkhaṇikā, tato paraṃ dve tīṇi phalacittāni yathārahaṃ uppajjanti, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapāto.
[03]^b^36^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nirodhasamāpattikāle dvikkhattuṃ catutthāruppajavanaṃ javati, tato paraṃ nirodhaṃ phusati.
[03]^b^37^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vuṭṭhānakāle ca anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaphalaṃ vā yathārahamekavāraṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe bhavaṅgapātova hoti.
[03]^b^38^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sabbatthāpi samāpattivīthiyaṃ bhavaṅgasoto viya vīthiniyamo natthīti katvā bahūnipi labbhantīti.
[03]^b^40^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Duhetukānamahetukānañca^eb^^a^M0.0028^ea^^a^V0.0030^ea^ panettha kiriyajavanāni ceva appanājavanāni ca labbhanti.
[03]^b^42^eb^^b^.^eb^ Duggatiyaṃ pana ñāṇavippayuttāni ca mahāvipākāni na labbhanti.
[03]^b^46^eb^^b^.^eb^ Anāgāmipuggalānaṃ pana paṭighajavanāni ca na labbhanti.
[03]^b^52^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sabbatthāpi ^a^M0.0029^ea^ ca taṃtaṃpasādarahitānaṃ taṃtaṃdvārikavīthicittāni na labbhanteva.
[03]^b^55^eb^^b^.^eb^ Iccevaṃ chadvārikacittappavatti yathāsambhavaṃ bhavaṅgantaritā yāvatāyukamabbocchinnā pavattati.
[03]^b^2^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catasso bhuumiyo, catubbidhaa pa.tisandhi, cattaari kammaani, catudhaa mara.nuppatti ceti viithimuttasa"ngahe cattaari catukkaani veditabbaani.
[03]^b^3^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha ^a^V0.0032^ea^ apaayabhuumi kaamasugatibhuumi ruupaavacarabhuumi aruupaavacarabhuumi ceti catasso bhuumiyo naama.
[03]^b^4^eb^^b^.^eb^ Taasu nirayo tiracchaanayoni pettivisayo asurakaayo ceti ^b^apaayabhuumi catubbidhaa^eb^ hoti.
[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^ Manussaa ^a^M0.0030^ea^ caatumahaaraajikaa taavati.msaa yaamaa tusitaa nimmaanarati paranimmitavasavattii ceti ^b^kaamasugatibhuumi sattavidhaa^eb^ hoti.
[03]^b^10^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vehapphalaa asa~n~nasattaa suddhaavaasaa ceti catutthajjhaanabhuumiiti ^b^ruupaavacarabhuumi so.lasavidhaa^eb^ hoti.
[03]^b^11^eb^^b^.^eb^ Avihaa atappaa sudassaa sudassii akani.t.thaa ceti ^b^suddhaavaasabhuumi pa~ncavidhaa^eb^ hoti.
[03]^b^12^eb^^b^.^eb^ AAkaasaana~ncaayatanabhuumi vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanabhuumi aaki~nca~n~naayatanabhuumi nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanabhuumi ceti ^b^aruupabhuumi catubbidhaa^eb^ hoti.
[03]^b^15^eb^^b^.^eb^ Apaayapa.tisandhi ^a^M0.0031^ea^ kaamasugatipa.tisandhi ruupaavacarapa.tisandhi aruupaavacarapa.tisandhi ceti ^b^catubbidhaa pa.tisandhi^eb^ naama.

[03]^b^16^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha akusalavipaakopekkhaasahagatasantiira.na.m apaayabhuumiya.m okkantikkha.ne pa.tisandhi hutvaa tato para.m bhava"nga.m pariyosaane cavana.m hutvaa vocchijjati, ^b^ayamekaapaayapa.tisandhi^eb^ naama.

[03]^b^17^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kusalavipaakopekkhaasahagatasantiira.na.m pana kaamasugatiya.m manussaana~nceva jaccandhaadiina.m bhummassitaana~nca vinipaatikaasuraana.m pa.tisandhibhava"ngacutivasena pavattati.
[03]^b^18^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mahaavipaakaani pana a.t.tha sabbatthaapi kaamasugatiya.m pa.tisandhibhava"ngacutivasena pavattanti.
[03]^b^20^eb^^b^.^eb^ Saa panaaya.m dasavidhaapi kaamaavacarapa.tisandhicceva sa"nkha.m gacchati.
[03]^b^21^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tesu ^a^V0.0034^ea^ catunna.m apaayaana.m manussaana.m vinipaatikaasuraana~nca aayuppamaa.naga.nanaaya niyamo natthi.

[03]^b^22^eb^^b^.^eb^ Caatumahaaraajikaana.m pana devaana.m dibbaani pa~ncavassasataani aayuppamaa.na.m, manussaga.nanaaya navutivassasatasahassappamaa.na.m hoti, tato catuggu.na.m taavati.msaana.m, tato catuggu.na.m yaamaana.m, tato catuggu.na.m tusitaana.m, tato catuggu.na.m nimmaanaratiina.m, tato catuggu.na.m paranimmitavasavattiina.m.

[03]^b^28^eb^^b^.^eb^ Asa~n~nasattaana.m pana ruupameva pa.tisandhi hoti. Tathaa tato para.m pavattiya.m cavanakaale ca ruupameva pavattitvaa nirujjhati, imaa ^b^cha ruupaavacarapa.tisandhiyo^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^29^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tesu brahmapaarisajjaana.m devaana.m kappassa tatiyo bhaago aayuppamaa.na.m.
[03]^b^44^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pa.thamaaruppaadivipaakaani pa.thamaaruppaadibhuumiisu yathaakkama.m pa.tisandhibhava"ngacutivasena pavattanti. Imaa ^b^catasso aruupapa.tisandhiyo^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^45^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tesu pana aakaasaana~ncaayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m viisatikappasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m.
[03]^b^52^eb^^b^.^eb^ Di.t.thadhammavedaniiya.m upapajjavedaniiya.m aparaapariyavedaniiya.m ahosikamma~nceti ^b^paakakaalavasena^eb^ cattaari kammaani naama.
[03]^b^54^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha ^a^M0.0034^ea^ akusala.m kaayakamma.m vaciikamma.m manokamma~nceti kammadvaaravasena tividha.m hoti.
[03]^b^55^eb^^b^.^eb^ Katha.m? Paa.naatipaato adinnaadaana.m kaamesumicchaacaaro ceti kaayavi~n~nattisa"nkhaate kaayadvaare baahullavuttito ^b^kaayakamma.m^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^56^eb^^b^.^eb^ Musaavaado pisu.navaacaa pharusavaacaa samphappalaapo ceti vaciivi~n~nattisa"nkhaate vaciidvaare baahullavuttito ^b^vaciikamma.m^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^57^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhijjhaa byaapaado micchaadi.t.thi ceti a~n~natraapi vi~n~nattiyaa manasmi.myeva baahullavuttito ^b^manokamma.m^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^58^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tesu paa.naatipaato pharusavaacaa byaapaado ca dosamuulena jaayanti.
[03]^b^61^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cittuppaadavasena paneta.m akusala.m sabbathaapi dvaadasavidha.m hoti.
[03]^b^62^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kaamaavacarakusalampi kaayadvaare pavatta.m kaayakamma.m, vaciidvaare pavatta.m vaciikamma.m, manodvaare pavatta.m manokamma~nceti kammadvaaravasena tividha.m hoti.
[03]^b^66^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ta.m ^a^M0.0035^ea^ paneta.m viisatividhampi kaamaavacarakammamicceva sa"nkha.m gacchati.
[03]^b^67^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ruupaavacarakusala.m pana manokammameva, ta~nca bhaavanaamaya.m appanaappatta.m, jhaana"ngabhedena pa~ncavidha.m hoti.
[03]^b^68^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tathaa aruupaavacarakusala~nca manokamma.m, tampi bhaavanaamaya.m appanaappatta.m. AAramma.nabhedena catubbidha.m hoti.

[03]^b^69^eb^^b^.^eb^ Etthaakusalakammamuddhaccarahita.m apaayabhuumiya.m pa.tisandhi.m janeti, pavattiya.m pana sabbampi dvaadasavidha.m sattaakusalapaakaani sabbatthaapi kaamaloke ruupaloke ca yathaaraha.m vipaccati.

[03]^b^70^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kaamaavacarakusalampi kaamasugatiyameva pa.tisandhi.m janeti, tathaa pavattiya~nca mahaavipaakaani ^a^V0.0038^ea^, ahetukavipaakaani pana a.t.thapi sabbatthaapi kaamaloke ruupaloke ca yathaaraha.m vipaccati.
[03]^b^71^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatthaapi tihetukamukka.t.tha.m kusala.m tihetuka.m pa.tisandhi.m datvaa pavatte so.lasa vipaakaani vipaccati.
[03]^b^72^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tihetukamomaka.m dvihetukamukka.t.tha~nca kusala.m dvihetuka.m pa.tisandhi.m datvaa pavatte tihetukarahitaani dvaadasa vipaakaani vipaccati.
[03]^b^73^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dvihetukamomaka.m pana kusala.m ahetukameva pa.tisandhi.m deti, pavatte ca ahetukavipaakaaneva vipaccati.
[03]^b^75^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ruupaavacarakusala.m ^a^M0.0036^ea^ pana pa.thamajjhaana.m paritta.m bhaavetvaa brahmapaarisajjesu uppajjati.
[03]^b^78^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tathaa dutiyajjhaana.m tatiyajjhaana~nca paritta.m bhaavetvaa parittaabhesu.
[03]^b^89^eb^^b^.^eb^ AAyukkhayena kammakkhayena ubhayakkhayena upacchedakakammunaa ceti ^b^catudhaa mara.nuppatti^eb^ naama.

[03]^b^90^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tathaa ^a^M0.0037^ea^ ca marantaana.m pana mara.nakaale yathaaraha.m abhimukhiibhuuta.m bhavantare pa.tisandhijanaka.m kamma.m vaa, ta.mkammakara.nakaale ruupaadikamupaladdhapubbamupakara.nabhuuta~nca kammanimitta.m vaa, anantaramuppajjamaanabhave upalabhitabbamupabhogabhuuta~nca gatinimitta.m vaa kammabalena channa.m dvaaraana.m a~n~natarasmi.m paccupa.t.thaati, tato para.m tameva tathopa.t.thita.m aaramma.na.m aarabbha vipaccamaanakakammaanuruupa.m parisuddha.m upakkili.t.tha.m vaa upalabhitabbabhavaanuruupa.m tattho.nata.mva cittasantaana.m abhi.nha.m pavattati baahullena, tameva vaa pana janakabhuuta.m kamma.m abhinavakara.navasena dvaarappatta.m hoti.

[03]^b^91^eb^^b^.^eb^ Paccaasannamara.nassa ^a^V0.0040^ea^ tassa viithicittaavasaane bhava"ngakkhaye vaa cavanavasena paccuppannabhavapariyosaanabhuuta.m cuticitta.m uppajjitvaa nirujjhati, tasmi.m niruddhaavasaane tassaanantarameva tathaagahita.m aaramma.na.m aarabbha savatthuka.m avatthukameva vaa yathaaraha.m avijjaanusayaparikkhittena ta.nhaanusayamuulakena sa"nkhaarena janiyamaana.m sampayuttehi pariggayhamaana.m sahajaataanamadhi.t.thaanabhaavena pubba"ngamabhuuta.m bhavantarapa.tisandhaanavasena pa.tisandhisa"nkhaata.m maanasa.m uppajjamaanameva pati.t.thaati bhavantare.

[03]^b^92^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mara.naasannaviithiya.m panettha mandappavattaani pa~nceva javanaani paa.tika"nkhitabbaani, tasmaa yadi paccuppannaaramma.nesu aapaathagatesu dharantesveva mara.na.m hoti, tadaa pa.tisandhibhava"ngaanampi paccuppannaaramma.nataa labbhatiiti katvaa kaamaavacarapa.tisandhiyaa chadvaaraggahita.m kammanimitta.m gatinimitta~nca paccuppannamatiitaaramma.na.m upalabbhati, kamma.m pana atiitameva, ta~nca manodvaaraggahita.m, taani pana sabbaanipi parittadhammabhuutaanevaaramma.naani.
[03]^b^94^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tathaa ^a^M0.0038^ea^ aruupapa.tisandhiyaa ca mahaggatabhuuta.m pa~n~nattibhuuta~nca kammanimittameva yathaarahamaaramma.na.m hoti.
[03]^b^95^eb^^b^.^eb^ Asa~n~nasattaana.m pana jiivitanavakameva pa.tisandhibhaavena pati.t.thaati, tasmaa te ruupapa.tisandhikaa naama.

[03]^b^99^eb^^b^.^eb^ Icceva.m gahitapa.tisandhikaana.m pana pa.tisandhinirodhaanantarato pabhuti tamevaaramma.namaarabbha tadeva citta.m yaava cuticittuppaadaa asati viithicittuppaade bhavassa a"ngabhaavena bhava"ngasantatisa"nkhaata.m maanasa.m abbocchinna.m nadiisoto viya pavattati.
[03]^b^100^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pariyosaane ca cavanavasena cuticitta.m hutvaa nirujjhati.
[03]^b^101^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tato para~nca pa.tisandhaadayo rathacakkamiva yathaakkama.m eva parivattantaa pavattanti.
[03]^b^3^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cattaari mahaabhuutaani, catunna~nca mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaayaruupanti ^b^duvidhampeta.m ruupa.m^eb^ ekaadasavidhena sa"ngaha.m gacchati.
[03]^b^4^eb^^b^.^eb^ Katha.m? Pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatu ^b^bhuutaruupa.m^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cakkhu sota.m ghaana.m jivhaa kaayo ^b^pasaadaruupa.m^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^6^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ruupa.m saddo gandho raso aapodhaatuvivajjita.m bhuutattayasa"nkhaata.m pho.t.thabba.m ^b^gocararuupa.m^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^11^eb^^b^.^eb^ Iti ^a^M0.0040^ea^ ca a.t.thaarasavidhampeta.m ruupa.m sabhaavaruupa.m salakkha.naruupa.m nipphannaruupa.m ruuparuupa.m sammasanaruupanti ca sa"ngaha.m gacchati.
[03]^b^14^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ruupassa lahutaa mudutaa kamma~n~nataa vi~n~nattidvaya.m ^b^vikaararuupa.m^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^15^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ruupassa upacayo santati jarataa aniccataa ^b^lakkha.naruupa.m^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^16^eb^^b^.^eb^ Jaatiruupameva ^a^V0.0043^ea^ panettha upacayasantatinaamena pavuccatiiti ekaadasavidhampeta.m ruupa.m a.t.thaviisatividha.m hoti saruupavasena.

[03]^b^18^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sabba~nca paneta.m ruupa.m ahetuka.m sappaccaya.m saasava.m sa"nkhata.m lokiya.m kaamaavacara.m anaaramma.na.m appahaatabbamevaati ekavidhampi ajjhattikabaahiraadivasena bahudhaa bheda.m gacchati.
[03]^b^23^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pasaadavisayasa"nkhaata.m dvaadasavidhampi ^b^o.laarikaruupa.m santikeruupa.m, sappa.tigharuupa~nca,^eb^ itara.m ^b^sukhumaruupa.m duureruupa.m appa.tigharuupa~nca^eb^.
[03]^b^26^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cakkhaadidvaya.m asampattavasena, ghaanaadittaya.m sampattavasenaati pa~ncavidhampi ^b^gocaraggaahikaruupa.m,^eb^ itara.m ^b^agocaraggaahikaruupa.m^eb^.
[03]^b^27^eb^^b^.^eb^ Va.n.no gandho raso ojaa bhuutacatukka~nceti a.t.thavidhampi ^b^avinibbhogaruupa.m,^eb^ itara.m ^b^vinibbhogaruupa.m^eb^.
[03]^b^29^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kamma.m citta.m utu aahaaro ceti ^b^cattaari ruupasamu.t.thaanaani^eb^ naama.

[03]^b^30^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha kaamaavacara.m ruupaavacara~nceti pa~ncaviisatividhampi kusalaakusalakammamabhisa"nkhata.m ajjhattikasantaane kammasamu.t.thaanaruupa.m pa.tisandhimupaadaaya kha.ne kha.ne samu.t.thaapeti.
[03]^b^31^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aruupavipaakadvipa~ncavi~n~naa.navajjita.m ^a^M0.0042^ea^ pa~ncasattatividhampi citta.m cittasamu.t.thaanaruupa.m pa.thamabhava"ngamupaadaaya jaayantameva samu.t.thaapeti.
[03]^b^35^eb^^b^.^eb^ Siitu.nhotusama~n~naataa ^a^V0.0045^ea^ tejodhaatu .thitippattaava utusamu.t.thaanaruupa.m ajjhatta~nca bahiddhaa ca yathaaraha.m samu.t.thaapeti.
[03]^b^41^eb^^b^.^eb^ Avinibbhogaruupaani ceva aakaasadhaatu ca. Catuuhi sambhuutaani.
[03]^b^45^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ekuppaadaa ^a^M0.0043^ea^ ekanirodhaa ekanissayaa sahavuttino ^b^ekaviisati ruupakalaapaa^eb^ naama.

[03]^b^46^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha jiivita.m avinibbhogaruupa~nca cakkhunaa saha cakkhudasakanti pavuccati. Tathaa ^a^V0.0046^ea^ sotaadiihi saddhi.m sotadasaka.m ghaanadasaka.m jivhaadasaka.m kaayadasaka.m itthibhaavadasaka.m pumbhaavadasaka.m vatthudasaka~nceti yathaakkama.m yojetabba.m. Avinibbhogaruupameva jiivitena saha jiivitanavakanti pavuccati. Ime ^b^nava kammasamu.t.thaanakalaapaa^eb^.

[03]^b^47^eb^^b^.^eb^ Avinibbhogaruupa.m pana suddha.t.thaka.m, tadeva kaayavi~n~nattiyaa saha kaayavi~n~nattinavaka.m, vaciivi~n~nattisaddehi saha vaciivi~n~nattidasaka.m, lahutaadiihi saddhi.m lahutaadekaadasaka.m, kaayavi~n~nattilahutaadidvaadasaka.m, vaciivi~n~nattisaddalahutaaditerasaka~nceti ^b^cha cittasamu.t.thaanakalaapaa^eb^.
[03]^b^50^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha suddha.t.thaka.m saddanavaka~nceti dve utusamu.t.thaanakalaapaa bahiddhaapi labbhanti, avasesaa pana sabbepi ajjhattikamevaati.
[03]^b^52^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sabbaanipi ^a^M0.0044^ea^ panetaani ruupaani kaamaloke yathaaraha.m anuunaani pavattiya.m upalabbhanti.

[03]^b^53^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pa.tisandhiya.m ^a^V0.0047^ea^ pana sa.msedajaana~nceva opapaatikaana~nca cakkhusotaghaanajivhaakaayabhaavavatthudasakasa"nkhaataani satta dasakaani paatubhavanti ukka.t.thavasena, omakavasena pana cakkhusotaghaanabhaavadasakaani kadaacipi na labbhanti, tasmaa tesa.m vasena kalaapahaani veditabbaa.

[03]^b^54^eb^^b^.^eb^ Gabbhaseyyakasattaana.m pana kaayabhaavavatthudasakasa"nkhaataani tii.ni dasakaani paatubhavanti, tatthaapi bhaavadasaka.m kadaaci na labbhati, tato para.m pavattikaale kamena cakkhudasakaadiini ca paatubhavanti.

[03]^b^55^eb^^b^.^eb^ Icceva.m pa.tisandhimupaadaaya kammasamu.t.thaanaa, dutiyacittamupaadaaya cittasamu.t.thaanaa, .thitikaalamupaadaaya utusamu.t.thaanaa, ojaaphara.namupaadaaya aahaarasamu.t.thaanaa ceti catusamu.t.thaanaruupakalaapasantati kaamaloke diipajaalaa viya, nadiisoto viya ca yaavataayukamabbocchinnaa pavattati.

[03]^b^56^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mara.nakaale pana cuticittoparisattarasamacittassa .thitikaalamupaadaaya kammajaruupaani na uppajjanti, puretaramuppannaani ca kammajaruupaani cuticittasamakaalameva pavattitvaa nirujjhanti, tato para.m cittajaahaarajaruupa~nca vocchijjati, tato para.m utusamu.t.thaanaruupaparamparaa yaava mataka.levarasa"nkhaataa pavattanti.

[03]^b^58^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ruupaloke ^a^M0.0045^ea^ pana ghaanajivhaakaayabhaavadasakaani ca aahaarajakalaapaani ca na labbhanti, tasmaa tesa.m pa.tisandhikaale cakkhusotavatthuvasena tii.ni dasakaani jiivitanavaka~nceti cattaaro kammasamu.t.thaanakalaapaa, pavattiya.m cittotusamu.t.thaanaa ca labbhanti.

[03]^b^59^eb^^b^.^eb^ Asa~n~nasattaana.m pana cakkhusotavatthusaddaapi na labbhanti, tathaa sabbaanipi cittajaruupaani, tasmaa tesa.m pa.tisandhikaale jiivitanavakameva, pavattiya~nca saddavajjita.m utusamu.t.thaanaruupa.m atiricchati.
[03]^b^60^eb^^b^.^eb^ Icceva.m ^a^V0.0048^ea^ kaamaruupaasa~n~niisa"nkhaatesu tiisu .thaanesu pa.tisandhipavattivasena duvidhaa ruupappavatti veditabbaa.
[22]Na labbhanti pavatte tu, na ki~ncipi na labbhati.

[03]^b^62^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nibbaana.m^eb^ pana lokuttarasa"nkhaata.m catumagga~naa.nena sacchikaatabba.m maggaphalaanamaaramma.nabhuuta.m vaanasa"nkhaataaya ta.nhaaya nikkhantattaa nibbaananti pavuccati.
[03]^b^63^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tadeta.m sabhaavato ekavidhampi saupaadisesanibbaanadhaatu anupaadisesanibbaanadhaatu ceti duvidha.m hoti kaara.napariyaayena.
[03]^b^64^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tathaa ^a^M0.0046^ea^ su~n~nata.m animitta.m appa.nihita~nceti tividha.m hoti aakaarabhedena.
[03]^b^2^eb^^b^.^eb^ Akusalasa"ngaho missakasa"ngaho bodhipakkhiyasa"ngaho sabbasa"ngaho ceti samuccayasa"ngaho catubbidho veditabbo.
[03]^b^3^eb^^b^.^eb^ Katha.m? ^b^Akusalasa"ngahe^eb^ taava cattaaro aasavaa – kaamaasavo bhavaasavo di.t.thaasavo avijjaasavo.
[03]^b^4^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cattaaro oghaa – kaamogho bhavogho di.t.thogho avijjogho.
[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cattaaro yogaa – kaamayogo bhavayogo di.t.thiyogo avijjaayogo.
[03]^b^6^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cattaaro ganthaa – abhijjhaakaayagantho, byaapaado kaayagantho, siilabbataparaamaaso kaayagantho, ida.msaccaabhiniveso kaayagantho.
[03]^b^7^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cattaaro ^a^M0.0047^ea^ upaadaanaa – kaamupaadaana.m di.t.thupaadaana.m siilabbatupaadaana.m attavaadupaadaana.m.
[03]^b^8^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cha niivara.naani – kaamacchandaniivara.na.m byaapaadaniivara.na.m thinamiddhaniivara.na.m uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.na.m vicikicchaaniivara.na.m avijjaaniivara.na.m.
[03]^b^9^eb^^b^.^eb^ Satta ^a^V0.0050^ea^ anusayaa – kaamaraagaanusayo bhavaraagaanusayo pa.tighaanusayo maanaanusayo di.t.thaanusayo vicikicchaanusayo avijjaanusayo.

[03]^b^10^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasa sa.myojanaani – kaamaraagasa.myojana.m ruuparaagasa.myojana.m aruuparaagasa.myojana.m pa.tighasa.myojana.m maanasa.myojana.m di.t.thisa.myojana.m siilabbataparaamaasasa.myojana.m vicikicchaasa.myojana.m uddhaccasa.myojana.m avijjaasa.myojana.m suttante.

[03]^b^11^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aparaanipi dasa sa.myojanaani – kaamaraagasa.myojana.m bhavaraagasa.myojana.m pa.tighasa.myojana.m maanasa.myojana.m di.t.thisa.myojana.m siilabbataparaamaasasa.myojana.m vicikicchaasa.myojana.m issaasa.myojana.m macchariyasa.myojana.m avijjaasa.myojana.m abhidhamme (vibha. 969).
[03]^b^12^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasa kilesaa – lobho doso moho maano di.t.thi vicikicchaa thina.m uddhacca.m ahirika.m anottappa.m.
[03]^b^13^eb^^b^.^eb^ AAsavaadiisu panettha kaamabhavanaamena tabbatthukaa ta.nhaa adhippetaa, siilabbataparaamaaso ida.msaccaabhiniveso attavaadupaado ca tathaapavatta.m di.t.thigatameva pavuccati.
[03]^b^15^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Missakasa"ngahe^eb^ cha hetuu – lobho doso moho alobho adoso amoho.
[03]^b^16^eb^^b^.^eb^ Satta ^a^V0.0051^ea^ jhaana"ngaani – vitakko vicaaro piiti ekaggataa somanassa.m domanassa.m upekkhaa.

[03]^b^17^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dvaadasa magga"ngaani – sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi micchaadi.t.thi micchaasa"nkappo micchaavaayaamo micchaasamaadhi.

[03]^b^18^eb^^b^.^eb^ Baaviisatindriyaani – cakkhundriya.m sotindriya.m ghaanindriya.m jivhindriya.m kaayindriya.m itthindriya.m purisindriya.m jiivitindriya.m manindriya.m sukhindriya.m dukkhindriya.m somanassindriya.m domanassindriya.m upekkhindriya.m saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m pa~n~nindriya.m ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m a~n~nindriya.m a~n~naataavindriya.m.
[03]^b^19^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nava balaani – saddhaabala.m viiriyabala.m satibala.m samaadhibala.m pa~n~naabala.m hiribala.m ottappabala.m ahirikabala.m anottappabala.m.
[03]^b^20^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cattaaro adhipatii – chandaadhipati viiriyaadhipati cittaadhipati viima.msaadhipati.
[03]^b^21^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cattaaro aahaaraa – kaba.liikaaro aahaaro, phasso dutiyo, manosa~ncetanaa tatiyaa, vi~n~naa.na.m catuttha.m.
[03]^b^26^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pa~ncavi~n~naa.nesu jhaana"ngaani, aviiriyesu balaani, ahetukesu magga"ngaani na labbhanti.
[03]^b^27^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tathaa ^a^V0.0052^ea^ vicikicchaacitte ekaggataa maggindriyabalabhaava.m na gacchati.
[03]^b^29^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cha hetuu pa~nca jhaana"ngaa, magga"ngaa nava vatthuto.

[03]^b^30^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bodhipakkhiyasa"ngahe^eb^ cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa kaayaanupassanaasatipa.t.thaana.m vedanaanupassanaasatipa.t.thaana.m cittaanupassanaasatipa.t.thaana.m dhammaanupassanaasatipa.t.thaana.m.

[03]^b^31^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cattaaro sammappadhaanaa uppannaana.m paapakaana.m pahaanaaya vaayaamo, anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m anuppaadaaya vaayaamo, anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m uppaadaaya vaayaamo, uppannaana.m kusalaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya vaayaamo.
[03]^b^32^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cattaaro ^a^M0.0050^ea^ iddhipaadaa – chandiddhipaado viiriyiddhipaado cittiddhipaado viima.msiddhipaado.
[03]^b^33^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pa~ncindriyaani – saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m pa~n~nindriya.m.
[03]^b^34^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pa~nca balaani – saddhaabala.m viiriyabala.m satibala.m samaadhibala.m pa~n~naabala.m.
[03]^b^35^eb^^b^.^eb^ Satta bojjha"ngaa – satisambojjha"ngo dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo viiriyasambojjha"ngo piitisambojjha"ngo passaddhisambojjha"ngo samaadhisambojjha"ngo upekkhaasambojjha"ngo.
[03]^b^36^eb^^b^.^eb^ A.t.tha ^a^V0.0053^ea^ magga"ngaani – sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi.
[03]^b^37^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ettha pana cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaati sammaasati ekaava pavuccati.
[03]^b^41^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sabbe ^a^M0.0051^ea^ lokuttare honti, na vaa sa"nkappapiitiyo.
[03]^b^42^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabbasa"ngahe^eb^ pa~ncakkhandhaa – ruupakkhandho vedanaakkhandho sa~n~naakkhandho sa"nkhaarakkhandho vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
[03]^b^43^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa ^a^V0.0054^ea^ – ruupupaadaanakkhandho vedanupaadaanakkhandho sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho.

[03]^b^44^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dvaadasaayatanaani – cakkhaayatana.m sotaayatana.m ghaanaayatana.m jivhaayatana.m kaayaayatana.m manaayatana.m ruupaayatana.m saddaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m dhammaayatana.m.

[03]^b^45^eb^^b^.^eb^ A.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo – cakkhudhaatu sotadhaatu ghaanadhaatu jivhaadhaatu kaayadhaatu ruupadhaatu saddadhaatu gandhadhaatu rasadhaatu pho.t.thabbadhaatu cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatu ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatu jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatu kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu manodhaatu dhammadhaatu manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu.
[03]^b^46^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cattaari ariyasaccaani – dukkha.m ariyasacca.m, dukkhasamudayo ariyasacca.m, dukkhanirodho ariyasacca.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m.
[03]^b^47^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ettha pana cetasikasukhumaruupanibbaanavasena ekuunasattati dhammaa dhammaayatanadhammadhaatuuti sa"nkha.m gacchanti.
[03]^b^52^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dukkha.m ^a^V0.0055^ea^ tebhuumaka.m va.t.ta.m, ta.nhaa samudayo bhave.
[03]^b^1^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ, ye dhammā paccayā yathā.
[03]^b^2^eb^^b^.^eb^ Paṭiccasamuppādanayo paṭṭhānanayo ceti paccayasaṅgaho duvidho veditabbo.
[03]^b^3^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha tabbhāvabhāvībhāvākāramattopalakkhito paṭiccasamuppādanayo, paṭṭhānanayo pana āhaccapaccayaṭṭhitimārabbha pavuccati, ubhayaṃ pana vomissetvā papañcenti ācariyā.

[03]^b^4^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayā bhavo ^a^M0.0053^ea^, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā ^a^V0.0056^ea^ jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti. Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotīti ayamettha ^b^paṭiccasamuppādanayo^eb^.
[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha tayo addhā dvādasaṅgāni vīsatākārā tisandhi catusaṅkhepā tīṇi vaṭṭāni dve mūlāni ca veditabbāni.
[03]^b^6^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kathaṃ? Avijjāsaṅkhārā atīto addhā, jātijarāmaraṇaṃ anāgato addhā, majjhe aṭṭha paccuppanno addhāti tayo addhā.
[03]^b^7^eb^^b^.^eb^ Avijjā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ nāmarūpaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ phasso vedanā taṇhā upādānaṃ bhavo jāti jarāmaraṇanti dvādasaṅgāni.

[03]^b^9^eb^^b^.^eb^ Avijjāsaṅkhāraggahaṇena panettha taṇhupādānabhavāpi gahitā bhavanti, tathā taṇhupādānabhavaggahaṇena ca avijjāsaṅkhārā, jātijarāmaraṇaggahaṇena ca viññāṇādiphalapañcakameva gahitanti katvā –
[03]^b^11^eb^^b^.^eb^ Avijjātaṇhupādānā ca kilesavaṭṭaṃ, kammabhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadeso saṅkhārā ca kammavaṭṭaṃ, upapattibhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadeso avasesā ca vipākavaṭṭanti tīṇi vaṭṭāni.

[03]^b^14^eb^^b^.^eb^ Hetupaccayo ārammaṇapaccayo adhipatipaccayo anantarapaccayo samanantarapaccayo sahajātapaccayo aññamaññapaccayo nissayapaccayo upanissayapaccayo purejātapaccayo pacchājātapaccayo āsevanapaccayo kammapaccayo vipākapaccayo āhārapaccayo indriyapaccayo jhānapaccayo maggapaccayo sampayuttapaccayo vippayuttapaccayo atthipaccayo natthipaccayo vigatapaccayo avigatapaccayoti ayamettha ^b^paṭṭhānanayo^eb^.
[03]^b^15^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chadhā nāmaṃ tu nāmassa, pañcadhā nāmarūpinaṃ.

[03]^b^16^eb^^b^.^eb^ Anantaraniruddhā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ anantarasamanantaranatthivigatavasena, purimāni javanāni pacchimānaṃ javanānaṃ āsevanavasena, sahajātā cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññaṃ sampayuttavaseneti ca ^b^chadhā nāmaṃ nāmassa^eb^ paccayo hoti.

[03]^b^17^eb^^b^.^eb^ Hetujhānaṅgamaggaṅgāni sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ hetādivasena, sahajātā cetanā sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ, nānākkhaṇikā cetanā kammābhinibbattānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ kammavasena, vipākakkhandhā ^a^V0.0058^ea^ aññamaññaṃ sahajātānaṃ rūpānaṃ vipākavaseneti ^a^M0.0055^ea^ ca ^b^pañcadhā nāmaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ^eb^ paccayo hoti.
[03]^b^18^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātavaseneti ^b^ekadhāva nāmaṃ rūpassa^eb^ paccayo hoti.
[03]^b^19^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cha vatthūni pavattiyaṃ sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ pañcārammaṇāni ca pañcaviññāṇavīthiyā purejātavaseneti ^b^ekadhāva rūpaṃ nāmassa^eb^ paccayo hoti.
[03]^b^20^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ārammaṇavasena upanissayavaseneti ca ^b^duvidhā paññattināmarūpāni nāmasseva^eb^ paccayā honti.
[03]^b^22^eb^^b^.^eb^ Upanissayo pana tividho hoti – ārammaṇūpanissayo anantarūpanissayo pakatūpanissayo ceti.

[03]^b^25^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rāgādayo pana dhammā saddhādayo ca sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ puggalo bhojanaṃ utusenāsanañca yathārahaṃ ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca kusalādidhammānaṃ, kammaṃ vipākānanti ca bahudhā hoti pakatūpanissayo.
[03]^b^27^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha ^a^V0.0059^ea^ garukatamārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇādhipativasena nāmānaṃ, sahajātādhipati catubbidhopi sahajātavasena sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānanti ca duvidho hoti adhipatipaccayo.

[03]^b^28^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cittacetasikā dhammā ^a^M0.0056^ea^ aññamaññaṃ sahajātarūpānañca, mahābhūtā aññamaññaṃ upādārūpānañca, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuvipākā aññamaññanti ca tividho hoti sahajātapaccayo.
[03]^b^29^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññaṃ, mahābhūtā aññamaññaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuvipākā aññamaññanti ca tividho hoti aññamaññapaccayo.
[03]^b^30^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññaṃ sahajātarūpānañca, mahābhūtā aññamaññaṃ upādārūpānañca, cha vatthūni sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnanti ca tividho hoti nissayapaccayo.
[03]^b^31^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa, arūpino āhārā sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānanti ca duvidho hoti āhārapaccayo.
[03]^b^32^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañca pasādā pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ, rūpajīvitindriyaṃ upādinnarūpānaṃ, arūpino indriyā sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānanti ca tividho hoti indriyapaccayo.

[03]^b^33^eb^^b^.^eb^ Okkantikkhaṇe vatthu vipākānaṃ, cittacetasikā dhammā sahajātarūpānaṃ sahajātavasena, pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātavasena cha vatthūni pavattiyaṃ sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ purejātavaseneti ca tividho hoti vippayuttapaccayo.
[03]^b^35^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ārammaṇūpanissayakammatthipaccayesu ^a^V0.0060^ea^ ca sabbepi paccayā samodhānaṃ gacchanti.
[03]^b^36^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sahajātarūpanti ^a^M0.0057^ea^ panettha sabbatthāpi pavatte cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ, paṭisandhiyaṃ kaṭattārūpānañca vasena duvidhaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
[03]^b^37^eb^^b^.^eb^ Iti tekālikā dhammā, kālamuttā ca sambhavā.
[03]^b^38^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha rūpadhammā rūpakkhandhova, cittacetasikasaṅkhātā cattāro arūpino khandhā, nibbānañceti pañcavidhampi arūpanti ca nāmanti ca pavuccati.
[03]^b^39^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tato avasesā paññatti pana paññāpiyattā paññatti, paññāpanato paññattīti ca duvidhā hoti.

[03]^b^40^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kathaṃ? Taṃtaṃbhūtavipariṇāmākāramupādāya tathā tathā paññattā bhūmipabbatādikā, sambhārasannivesākāramupādāya geharathasakaṭādikā, khandhapañcakamupādāya purisapuggalādikā, candāvaṭṭanādikamupādāya disākālādikā, asamphuṭṭhākāramupādāya kūpaguhādikā, taṃtaṃbhūtanimittaṃ bhāvanāvisesañca upādāya kasiṇanimittādikā ceti evamādippabhedā pana paramatthato avijjamānāpi atthacchāyākārena cittuppādānamārammaṇabhūtā taṃ taṃ upādāya upanidhāya kāraṇaṃ katvā tathā tathā parikappiyamānā saṅkhāyati samaññāyati voharīyati paññāpīyatīti paññattīti pavuccati. Ayaṃ paññatti paññāpiyattā paññatti nāma.

[03]^b^41^eb^^b^.^eb^ Paññāpanato paññatti pana nāmanāmakammādināmena paridīpitā, sā vijjamānapaññatti avijjamānapaññatti, vijjamānena ^a^M0.0058^ea^ avijjamānapaññatti, avijjamānena vijjamānapaññatti ^a^V0.0061^ea^, vijjamānena vijjamānapaññatti, avijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti ceti chabbidhā hoti.

[03]^b^42^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha yadā pana paramatthato vijjamānaṃ rūpavedanādiṃ etāya paññāpenti, tadāyaṃ vijjamānapaññatti. Yadā pana paramatthato avijjamānaṃ bhūmipabbatādiṃ etāya paññāpenti, tadāyaṃ avijjamānapaññattīti pavuccati. Ubhinnaṃ pana vomissakavasena sesā yathākkamaṃ chaḷabhiñño, itthisaddo, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, rājaputtoti ca veditabbā.

[03]^b^2^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha ^b^samathasa"ngahe^eb^ taava dasa kasi.naani, dasa asubhaa, dasa anussatiyo, catasso appama~n~naayo, ekaa sa~n~naa, eka.m vavatthaana.m, cattaaro aaruppaa ceti sattavidhena samathakamma.t.thaanasa"ngaho.
[03]^b^3^eb^^b^.^eb^ Raagacaritaa ^a^M0.0059^ea^^a^V0.0062^ea^ dosacaritaa mohacaritaa saddhaacaritaa buddhicaritaa vitakkacaritaa ceti chabbidhena caritasa"ngaho.
[03]^b^4^eb^^b^.^eb^ Parikammabhaavanaa upacaarabhaavanaa appanaabhaavanaa ceti tisso bhaavanaa.
[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^ Parikammanimitta.m uggahanimitta.m pa.tibhaaganimitta~nceti tii.ni nimittaani ca veditabbaani.

[03]^b^6^eb^^b^.^eb^ Katha.m? Pathaviikasi.na.m aapokasi.na.m tejokasi.na.m vaayokasi.na.m niilakasi.na.m piitakasi.na.m lohitakasi.na.m odaatakasi.na.m aakaasakasi.na.m aalokakasi.na~nceti imaani ^b^dasa kasi.naani^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^7^eb^^b^.^eb^ Uddhumaataka.m viniilaka.m vipubbaka.m vicchiddaka.m vikkhaayitaka.m vikkhittaka.m hatavikkhittaka.m lohitaka.m pu.lavaka.m a.t.thika~nceti ime ^b^dasa asubhaa^eb^ naama.

[03]^b^8^eb^^b^.^eb^ Buddhaanussati dhammaanussati sa.mghaanussati siilaanussati caagaanussati devataanussati upasamaanussati mara.naanussati kaayagataasati aanaapaanassati ceti imaa ^b^dasa anussatiyo^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^9^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mettaa karu.naa muditaa upekkhaa ceti imaa ^b^catasso appama~n~naayo^eb^ naama, brahmavihaaroti ca pavuccati.
[03]^b^12^eb^^b^.^eb^ AAkaasaana~ncaayatanaadayo ^a^M0.0060^ea^^b^cattaaro aaruppaa^eb^ naamaati sabbathaapi samathaniddese cattaaliisa kamma.t.thaanaani bhavanti.
[03]^b^13^eb^^b^.^eb^ Caritaasu pana dasa asubhaa kaayagataasatisa"nkhaataa ko.t.thaasabhaavanaa ca raagacaritassa sappaayaa.
[03]^b^14^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catasso appama~n~naayo niilaadiini ca cattaari kasi.naani dosacaritassa.
[03]^b^18^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sesaani pana sabbaanipi kamma.t.thaanaani sabbesampi sappaayaani, tatthaapi kasi.nesu puthula.m mohacaritassa, khuddaka.m vitakkacaritassevaati.

[03]^b^19^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhaavanaasu^eb^ sabbatthaapi parikammabhaavanaa labbhateva, buddhaanussatiaadiisu a.t.thasu sa~n~naavavatthaanesu caati dasasukamma.t.thaanesu upacaarabhaavanaava sampajjati, natthi appanaa.
[03]^b^26^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nimittesu^eb^ pana parikammanimitta.m uggahanimitta~nca sabbatthaapi yathaaraha.m pariyaayena labbhanteva.
[03]^b^27^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pa.tibhaaganimitta.m pana kasi.naasubhako.t.thaasaaanaapaanesveva labbhati, tattha hi pa.tibhaaganimittamaarabbha upacaarasamaadhi appanaasamaadhi ca pavattanti.
[03]^b^28^eb^^b^.^eb^ Katha.m? AAdikammikassa hi pathaviima.n.dalaadiisu nimitta.m ugga.nhantassa tamaaramma.na.m parikammanimittanti pavuccati, saa ca bhaavanaa parikammabhaavanaa naama.

[03]^b^29^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yadaa pana ta.m nimitta.m cittena samuggahita.m hoti, cakkhunaa passantasseva manodvaarassa aapaathamaagata.m, tadaa tamevaaramma.na.m uggahanimitta.m naama, saa ca bhaavanaa samaadhiyati.

[03]^b^30^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tathaa samaahitassa panetassa tato para.m tasmi.m uggahanimitte parikammasamaadhinaa bhaavanamanuyu~njantassa yadaa tappa.tibhaaga.m vatthudhammavimuccita.m pa~n~nattisa"nkhaata.m bhaavanaamayamaaramma.na.m citte sannisanna.m samappita.m hoti, tadaa ta.m pa.tibhaaganimitta.m samuppannanti pavuccati.
[03]^b^31^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tato ^a^V0.0065^ea^ pa.t.thaaya paripanthavippahiinaa kaamaavacarasamaadhisa"nkhaataa upacaarabhaavanaa nipphannaa naama hoti.
[03]^b^32^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tato ^a^M0.0062^ea^ para.m tameva paribhaaganimitta.m upacaarasamaadhinaa samaasevantassa ruupaavacarapa.thamajjhaanamappeti.

[03]^b^33^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tato para.m tameva pa.thamajjhaana.m aavajjana.m samaapajjana.m adhi.t.thaana.m vu.t.thaana.m paccavekkha.naa ceti imaahi pa~ncahi vasitaahi vasiibhuuta.m katvaa vitakkaadikamo.laarika"nga.m pahaanaaya vicaaraadisukhuma"ngupattiyaa padahato yathaakkama.m dutiyajjhaanaadayo yathaarahamappenti.
[03]^b^36^eb^^b^.^eb^ AAkaasavajjitakasi.nesu pana ya.m ki~nci kasi.na.m ugghaa.tetvaa laddhamaakaasa.m anantavasena parikamma.m karontassa pa.thamaaruppamappeti.
[03]^b^37^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tameva pa.thamaaruppavi~n~naa.na.m anantavasena parikamma.m karontassa dutiyaaruppamappeti.
[03]^b^38^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tameva pa.thamaaruppavi~n~naa.naabhaava.m pana ‘‘natthi ki~ncii’’ti parikamma.m karontassa tatiyaaruppamappeti.

[03]^b^40^eb^^b^.^eb^ Avasesesu ca dasasu kamma.t.thaanesu buddhagu.naadikamaaramma.namaarabbha parikamma.m katvaa tasmi.m nimitte saadhukamuggahite tattheva parikamma~nca samaadhiyati, upacaaro ca sampajjati.

[03]^b^41^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhi~n~naavasena ^a^M0.0063^ea^ pavattamaana.m pana ruupaavacarapa~ncamajjhaana.m abhi~n~naapaadakapa~ncamajjhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa adhi.t.theyyaadikamaavajjetvaa parikamma.m karontassa ruupaadiisu aaramma.nesu yathaarahamappeti.

[03]^b^43^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vipassanaakamma.t.thaane^eb^ pana siilavisuddhi cittavisuddhi di.t.thivisuddhi ka"nkhaavitara.navisuddhi maggaamagga~naa.nadassanavisuddhi pa.tipadaa~naa.nadassanavisuddhi ~naa.nadassanavisuddhi ceti sattavidhena visuddhisa"ngaho.
[03]^b^45^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aniccaanupassanaa dukkhaanupassanaa anattaanupassanaa ceti tisso anupassanaa.

[03]^b^46^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sammasana~naa.na.m udayabbaya~naa.na.m bha"nga~naa.na.m bhaya~naa.na.m aadiinava~naa.na.m nibbidaa~naa.na.m muccitukamyataa~naa.na.m pa.tisa"nkhaa~naa.na.m sa"nkhaarupekkhaa~naa.na.m anuloma~naa.na~nceti dasa vipassanaa~naa.naani.
[03]^b^47^eb^^b^.^eb^ Su~n~nato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appa.nihito vimokkho ceti tayo vimokkhaa.
[03]^b^48^eb^^b^.^eb^ Su~n~nataanupassanaa ^a^M0.0064^ea^ animittaanupassanaa appa.nihitaanupassaanaa ceti tii.ni vimokkhamukhaani ca veditabbaani.

[03]^b^49^eb^^b^.^eb^ Katha.m ^a^V0.0067^ea^? Paatimokkhasa.mvarasiila.m indriyasa.mvarasiila.m aajiivapaarisuddhisiila.m paccayasannissitasiila~nceti catupaarisuddhisiila.m ^b^siilavisuddhi^eb^ naama.
[03]^b^50^eb^^b^.^eb^ Upacaarasamaadhi appanaasamaadhi ceti duvidhopi samaadhi ^b^cittavisuddhi^eb^ naama.

[03]^b^53^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tato para.m pana tathaapariggahitesu sappaccayesu tebhuumakasa"nkhaaresu atiitaadibhedabhinnesu khandhaadinayamaarabbha kalaapavasena sa"nkhipitvaa ‘‘anicca.m khaya.t.thena, dukkha.m bhaya.t.thena, anattaa asaaraka.t.thenaa’’ti addhaanavasena santativasena kha.navasena vaa sammasana~naa.nena lakkha.nattaya.m sammasantassa tesveva paccayavasena kha.navasena ca udayabbaya~naa.nena udayabbaya.m samanupassantassa ca –

[03]^b^54^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tathaa paripanthavimuttassa pana tassa udayabbaya~naa.nato pa.t.thaaya yaa vaanulomaa tilakkha.na.m vipassanaaparamparaaya pa.tipajjantassa nava vipassanaa~naa.naani ^b^pa.tipadaa~naa.nadassanavisuddhi^eb^ naama.

[03]^b^55^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tasseva.m pa.tipajjantassa ^a^M0.0065^ea^ pana vipassanaaparipaakamaagamma ‘‘idaani appanaa uppajjissatii’’ti bhava"nga.m vocchijjitvaa uppannamanodvaaraavajjanaanantara.m dve tii.ni vipassanaacittaani ya.m ki~nci aniccaadilakkha.namaarabbha parikammopacaaraanulomanaamena pavattanti.
[03]^b^56^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yaa ^a^V0.0068^ea^ sikhaappattaa, saa saanulomaa sa"nkhaarupekkhaa vu.t.thaanagaaminivipassanaati ca pavuccati.
[03]^b^57^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tato para.m gotrabhucitta.m nibbaanamaalambitvaa puthujjanagottamabhibhavanta.m, ariyagottamabhisambhonta~nca pavattati.
[03]^b^58^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tassaanantarameva maggo dukkhasacca.m parijaananto samudayasacca.m pajahanto, nirodhasacca.m sacchikaronto, maggasacca.m bhaavanaavasena appanaaviithimotarati.
[03]^b^59^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tato para.m dve tii.ni phalacittaani pavattitvaa bhava"ngapaatova hoti, puna bhava"nga.m vocchinditvaa paccavekkha.na~naa.naani pavattanti.
[22]Hiine kilese sese ca, paccavekkhati vaana vaa.
[03]^b^61^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tattha anattaanupassanaa attaabhinivesa.m mu~ncantii su~n~nataanupassanaa naama vimokkhamukha.m hoti.
[03]^b^64^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tasmaa yadi vu.t.thaanagaaminivipassanaa anattato vipassati, su~n~nato vimokkho naama hoti maggo.
[03]^b^65^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yadi aniccato vipassati, animitto vimokkho naama.
[03]^b^66^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yadi dukkhato vipassati, appa.nihito vimokkho naamaati ca maggo vipassanaagamanavasena tii.ni naamaani labhati, tathaa phala~nca maggaagamanavasena maggaviithiya.m.

[03]^b^67^eb^^b^.^eb^ Phalasamaapattiviithiya.m pana yathaavuttanayena vipassantaana.m yathaasakaphalamuppajjamaanampi vipassanaagamanavaseneva su~n~nataadivimokkhoti ca pavuccati, aaramma.navasena pana sarasavasena ca naamattaya.m sabbattha sabbesampi samameva ca.
[03]^b^68^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ettha pana sotaapattimagga.m bhaavetvaa di.t.thivicikicchaapahaanena pahiinaapaayagamano sattakkhattuparamo ^b^sotaapanno^eb^ naama hoti.
[03]^b^69^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sakadaagaamimagga.m bhaavetvaa raagadosamohaana.m tanukarattaa ^b^sakadaagaamii^eb^ naama hoti sakideva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa.
[03]^b^70^eb^^b^.^eb^ Anaagaamimagga.m ^a^M0.0067^ea^ bhaavetvaa kaamaraagabyaapaadaanamanavasesappahaanena ^b^anaagaamii^eb^ naama hoti anaagantvaa itthatta.m.
[03]^b^71^eb^^b^.^eb^ Arahattamagga.m bhaavetvaa anavasesakilesappahaanena ^b^arahaa^eb^ naama hoti khii.naasavo loke aggadakkhi.neyyoti.

[03]^b^73^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nirodhasamaapattisamaapajjana.m^eb^ pana anaagaamiina~nceva arahantaana~nca labbhati, tattha yathaakkama.m pa.thamajjhaanaadimahaggatasamaapatti.m samaapajjitvaa vu.t.thaaya tattha gate sa"nkhaaradhamme tattha tattheva vipassanto yaava aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m gantvaa tato para.m adhi.t.theyyaadika.m pubbakicca.m katvaa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samaapajjati, tassa dvinna.m appanaajavanaana.m parato vocchijjati cittasantati, tato nirodhasamaapanno naama hoti.

[03]^b^74^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vu.t.thaanakaale pana anaagaamino anaagaamiphalacitta.m, arahato arahattaphalacitta.m ekavaarameva pavattitvaa bhava"ngapaato hoti, tato para.m paccavekkha.na~naa.na.m pavattati.
